_header: O worldly princes let your faith be pight
_description: Exhortation to Princes to live well — five Monk’s Tale stanzas, with refrain phrase, ‘quite yow your mede’

PULTayM5.First Lines:
O Worldly princes lat youre feith be pightVnto your modre þat
                    callid is syonIn siche werris beth goddes owne knyghtGeyn heresies
                    hardy as a lyon…
PULTayM5.Last Lines:
…Outrayeth folye be prudence & resonAnd god for vertue wil
                    quite yow your mede
PULTayM5.Note:
Added to blank page at end of volume by a hand of the fifteenth
                    century.
